title: Data Structures and Algorithms
description: This course covers fundamental data structures, algorithms, and problem-solving techniques essential for computer science and software engineering. Emphasis is placed on algorithm analysis, efficiency, and practical implementation using a high-level programming language.
objectives: Understand and implement basic data structures like arrays, linked lists, stacks, queues, trees, and graphs.
Analyze algorithm complexity using Big O notation.
Design efficient algorithms for sorting, searching, and traversal problems.
Develop problem-solving and coding skills for real-world applications.
weekly_topics: Week 1: Introduction to Data Structures and Algorithms
Week 2: Complexity Analysis and Big O Notation
Week 3: Arrays and Strings
Week 4: Linked Lists
Week 5: Stacks and Queues
Week 6: Recursion and Divide & Conquer
Week 7: Sorting Algorithms
Week 8: Searching Algorithms
Week 9: Trees
Week 10: Graphs and Graph Algorithms
Week 11: Advanced Data Structures
Week 12: Final Project & Review

title: Android App Development Fundamentals
description: This course introduces students to Android application development. Students will learn to design, develop, and deploy Android apps using Kotlin and Android Studio, focusing on UI/UX, performance, and integration with APIs and databases.
objectives: Understand the architecture of Android applications.
Design responsive and user-friendly Android interfaces using XML and Jetpack Compose.
Develop Android apps using Kotlin and best practices.
Integrate APIs, local storage, and databases into Android apps.
Deploy Android apps to Google Play Store and test on multiple devices.
weekly_topics: Week 1: Introduction to Android Development and Android Studio Setup
Week 2: Kotlin Basics for Android Programming
Week 3: Android UI Components (Layouts, Views, Widgets)
Week 4: Event Handling and Navigation (Activities & Intents)
Week 5: Fragments and Advanced UI Design
Week 6: Data Storage: SharedPreferences, SQLite, Room
Week 7: Working with REST APIs and JSON
Week 8: Background Tasks and Services
Week 9: Notifications, Broadcast Receivers, and Sensors
Week 10: Performance Optimization and Debugging
Week 11: Testing, Deployment, and Google Play Submission
Week 12: Final Android App Project & Review
